title: Is There a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14 Release Date or Part 2?
description: Viewers are eager to know if there’s a release date and time for Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14, or the possibility of a Part 2. The television series is the second spin-off of the popular legal drama Suits. It follows former federal prosecutor Ted Black, who now represents elite clients in Los Angeles with […] The post Is There a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14 Release Date or Part 2? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Curious if Suits LA Season 1 has an Episode 14 release date and time, or Part 2? Here's all you need to know!
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Viewers are eager to know if there’s a release date and time for Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14, or the possibility of a Part 2. The television series is the second spin-off of the popular legal drama Suits. It follows former federal prosecutor Ted Black, who now represents elite clients in Los Angeles with a focus on criminal and entertainment law. After the recent airing of Episode 13, fans are excited to see what comes next. So, here’s everything you need to know about whether there’s a possibility of a Part 2 or Episode 14 for Suits LA. Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time explained There isn’t a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time. This is because it has officially wrapped up, featuring a total of 13 episodes. With the release of the 13th episode marking the end of the current installment, there will be no Episode 14 or Part 2 with additional episodes. In this captivating legal drama, viewers follow the life of Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor who started a new life after a scandal forced him to leave behind what he had achieved before. Black establishes a law practice in Los Angeles. The television series delves into the high-stakes legal battles of Hollywood, where glamor and fierce competition collide, involving celebrities, tricky contracts, and some very lucrative deals. Has Suits LA Season 1 ended? Yes, Suits LA Season 1 has finished. It debuted on February 23, 2025, featuring a total of 13 episodes that aired every Sunday. The first installment then concluded on May 18, 2025. According to Deadline, NBC has officially canceled Suits LA. Thus, fans shouldn’t expect any more episodes from the television series. The show is confirmed to have ended after its initial run. NBC’s spin-off series didn’t attract much attention, and its viewership numbers and reception rate were quite low, leading to the network’s decision to cancel it. Where to watch previous Suits LA Season 1 episodes You can watch Suits LA Season 1 via NBC and Peacock. All episodes of the television series are available for viewing on NBC. They were also made available on Peacock the very next day. While NBC is a highly reputable and one of the oldest cable networks, Peacock provides an excellent streaming experience with a plethora of entertaining titles. The series’ synopsis reads: “Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor from New York, has reinvented himself representing the most powerful clients in Los Angeles. But his firm is at a crisis point, and in order to survive, he must embrace a role he held in contempt his entire career.”
html:
Viewers are eager to know if there’s a release date and time for Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14, or the possibility of a Part 2. The television series is the second spin-off of the popular legal drama Suits. It follows former federal prosecutor Ted Black, who now represents elite clients in Los Angeles with a focus on criminal and entertainment law. After the recent airing of Episode 13, fans are excited to see what comes next.

So, here’s everything you need to know about whether there’s a possibility of a Part 2 or Episode 14 for Suits LA.

Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time explained

There isn’t a Suits LA Season 1 Episode 14 release date and time. This is because it has officially wrapped up, featuring a total of 13 episodes. With the release of the 13th episode marking the end of the current installment, there will be no Episode 14 or Part 2 with additional episodes.

In this captivating legal drama, viewers follow the life of Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor who started a new life after a scandal forced him to leave behind what he had achieved before. Black establishes a law practice in Los Angeles. The television series delves into the high-stakes legal battles of Hollywood, where glamor and fierce competition collide, involving celebrities, tricky contracts, and some very lucrative deals.

Has Suits LA Season 1 ended?

Yes, Suits LA Season 1 has finished. It debuted on February 23, 2025, featuring a total of 13 episodes that aired every Sunday. The first installment then concluded on May 18, 2025.

According to Deadline, NBC has officially canceled Suits LA. Thus, fans shouldn’t expect any more episodes from the television series. The show is confirmed to have ended after its initial run. NBC’s spin-off series didn’t attract much attention, and its viewership numbers and reception rate were quite low, leading to the network’s decision to cancel it.

Where to watch previous Suits LA Season 1 episodes

You can watch Suits LA Season 1 via NBC and Peacock.

All episodes of the television series are available for viewing on NBC. They were also made available on Peacock the very next day. While NBC is a highly reputable and one of the oldest cable networks, Peacock provides an excellent streaming experience with a plethora of entertaining titles.

The series’ synopsis reads:

“Ted Black, a former federal prosecutor from New York, has reinvented himself representing the most powerful clients in Los Angeles. But his firm is at a crisis point, and in order to survive, he must embrace a role he held in contempt his entire career.”
